merchant_id.label: Merchant ID
merchant_id.comment:
Used when posting data from Magento to DataCash.
Supplied by DataCash when you setup your account.

merchant_password.label: Merchant Key
merchant_password.comment:
Used when posting data from Magento to DataCash.
Supplied by DataCash when you setup your account.
This will be reset every 12 months and will need to be updated.

page_set_id.label: Page Set ID
page_set_id.comment:
Defines the design of the hosted form.
Supplied by DataCash when you setup your account.

allow_tokenizer.label: Enable DataCash Tokenised Cards
allow_tokenizer.comment: This allows the users to save and re-use saved cards.

debug.label: Debug
debug.comment: Enable additional log output for payment processes

threedsecure_behaviour_159.label: DPG Response 159 - No VERes from DS
threedsecure_behaviour_159.comment:
If DataCash does not receive a response from the
Directory Service, the card cannot be validated as
participating in 3-D Secure. In these circumstances
please choose how you would like to continue.

threedsecure_behaviour_160.label: DPG Response 160 - Invalid VERes from DS
threedsecure_behaviour_160.comment:
If DataCash does receive a response from the Directory Service
but it is invalid, it is not possible to ascertain if the
card is participating in 3-D Secure. In these circumstances
please choose how you would like to continue.

threedsecure_behaviour_173.label: DPG Response 173 - Card not Enrolled in Cache
threedsecure_behaviour_173.comment:
Card is not in cache so no 3-D Secure Enrollment Check Request is submitted.
In these circumstances please choose how you would like to continue.

threedsecure_behaviour_187.label: DPG Response 187 - Unable to Verify
threedsecure_behaviour_187.comment:
If DataCash is not able to communicate with the Directory Service
there is no way of establishing if the card is participating in 3-D Secure.
In these circumstances please choose how you would like to continue.

merchant_id.comment:

Supplied by DataCash when you setup your account.

Supplied by DataCash when you setup your account.
This will be reset every 12 months and will need to be updated.

allow_tokenizer.comment: This allows the users to save and re-use saved cards.
